barcode.altText: 活动新闻与会员福利请见背面

backFields.label: CSSA 新闻
backFields.value:
芝大CSSA职业讲座
芝加哥大学中国学生学者联合会（UC CSSA）7月26日在芝加哥大学校园举办职业发展讲座。此次发展会的主题为“在美中国留学生求职创业”。活动通过由四位在各自领域有所建树的到场嘉宾与同学分享自身求职及创业经历。

新生BBQ
As the school year coming, we are going to throw a BBQ on Oct. 6th 2011 at Promontory Point. We would like to warmly invite all of you to join us for the annual CSSA BBQ event. Please circulate this advertisement and bring your friends and family there. We can have some light lunch, play games, chat with old friends and make new friends to expand our network oversea. Please go to the registration form below to put down your information in advance so we could prepare food accordingly. Registration will last until Oct. 4th. 
 
When: Oct. 6th, 2012 (Saturday) 12:00-4:00pm. If rain then change to Oct. 7th (Sunday)
Where: Promontory Point Park (Direction: walk eastbound along 55th Street till you reach the lake)
What: Barbeque (eating, chatting, game playing, sightseeing, etc.)
Fee: Free for first years and volunteers for the new student pick-up. As for others, $5 if you fill in this form in advance; $7 otherwise.
Contact: Jian Xu,jianxu.uchicago@gmail.com
 
We are eagerly looking forward to seeing all of you then!
